name: Fizzle (MrSquidness)
description:
Fizzle is a game where your objective is to make it out of a labyrinth before the flame on your torch goes out. To aid you in making it out there are items scattered around the labyrinth that you can use to navigate or if your torch is about to fizzle out then you can burn the items to increase the torches lifetime.

Used external assets:

"Nature - Essentials" by Nox_Sound: 
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/ambient/nature/nature-essentials-208...

"Footsteps - Essentials" by Nox_Sound:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-essentials-...
